value.string:
from Products.DCWorkflow.DCWorkflow import ValidationFailed
 
 error_message = ''
 transaction = state_change.object
 
 # first of all, validate the transaction it self
 container.validateTransaction(state_change)
 
 # Get sections.
 source_section = transaction.getSourceSection()
 destination_section = transaction.getDestinationSection()
 
 # Check transaction lines.
 if transaction.getPortalType() not in ('Balance Transaction',) : 
 accountingTransactionLineList = transaction.contentValues(
 filter={'portal_type': ('Accounting Transaction Line', 
 'Sale Invoice Transaction Line', 
 'Pay Sheet Transaction Line',
 'Purchase Invoice Transaction Line' )})
 sum = 0
 for transaction_line in accountingTransactionLineList:
 if source_section != destination_section :
 quantity = transaction_line.getQuantity() or 0.0
 else : 
 quantity = transaction_line.getSourceDebit() - transaction_line.getSourceCredit() + \
 transaction_line.getDestinationDebit() - transaction_line.getDestinationCredit() 
 sum += int(round(quantity * 100))
 if transaction_line.getSourceValue() is None : continue
 if transaction_line.getSourceValue().getAccountTypeId() in ("receivable", "payable") \
 and transaction_line.getSourceSection() in (None, "") :
 raise ValidationFailed, 'Action impossible : no source section defined for line %s where account type is "%s"'%\
 (transaction_line.getId(), transaction_line.getSource().getAccountTypeId())
 
 if transaction_line.getSourceValue().getAccountTypeId() == "cash" \
 and transaction_line.getSourcePayment() in (None, "") :
 raise ValidationFailed, 'Action impossible : no source payment defined for line %s where account type is "cash"'%transaction_line.getId()
 
 if sum > 0:
 raise ValidationFailed, 'Action impossible : credit is greater than debit' #: sum = %.2f' % (sum/100.0)
 elif sum < 0:
 raise ValidationFailed, 'Action impossible : credit is smaller than debit' #: sum = %.2f' % (sum/100.0)
 
 
 # checks if there is enough budget before validating this transaction
 AccountingTransaction_viewAccountingTransactionLineList = transaction.contentValues(
 filter={'portal_type': ('Accounting Transaction Line', 
 'Sale Invoice Transaction Line', 
 'Pay Sheet Transaction Line',
 'Purchase Invoice Transaction Line' )})
 # delete all objects wich are mapped values (predicates) in the budget module
 id_list = []
 for objects in transaction.getObject().getPortalObject().budget_module.objectValues():
 if objects.getPortalType() == 'Mapped Value':
 id_list.append(objects.getId())
 context.budget_module.manage_delObjects(id_list)
 # Create predicates (mapped values) from budget cells
 for objects in transaction.getObject().getPortalObject().budget_module.objectValues():
 if objects.getPortalType() == 'Budget':
 for obj_line in objects.objectValues():
 if obj_line.getPortalType() == 'Budget Line':
 for obj in obj_line.objectValues():
 financial_section = obj.getMembershipCriterionCategoryList()[0]
 function = obj.getMembershipCriterionCategoryList()[1]
 group = obj.getMembershipCriterionCategoryList()[2]
 budget = obj.getQuantity() + obj.getCurrentInventory() - obj.getConsumedBudget()
 budget_module = obj.getPortalObject().budget_module
 predicate = budget_module.newContent(portal_type='Mapped Value')
 predicate.setMembershipCriterionBaseCategoryList(['financial_section','function','group'])
 predicate.setMembershipCriterionCategoryList([financial_section,function,group])
 predicate.setCriterionPropertyList(['quantity','stop_date'])
 predicate.setCriterion('quantity',max=budget)
 predicate.setCriterion('stop_date',min=obj.getStartDate(),max=obj.getStopDate())
 predicate.immediateReindexObject()
 
 for line in AccountingTransaction_viewAccountingTransactionLineList:
 if line.getSource() and line.getSourceDebit()>0 and line.getPortalType() != "Sale Invoice Transaction Line":
 new_id = 'atl' + str(line.getId())
 financial_section = line.getSourceValue().getFinancialSectionValue().getCategoryRelativeUrl(base=0)
 function_category = line.getParent().getSourceFunction()
 function = context.portal_categories.getCategoryValue(function_category).getCategoryRelativeUrl(base=0)
 group = line.getParent().getSourceSectionValue().getGroup() 
 quantity = -line.getQuantity()
 #raise 'yoooooo', repr((line.getId(), line.getSource(),financial_section, function, group))
 temp_obj = line.asContext(
 id = new_id
 , title = line.getTitle()
 , start_date = line.getStartDate()
 , stop_date = line.getStopDate()
 , quantity = quantity
 , financial_section = financial_section
 , function = function
 , group = group
 )
 
 temp_obj.setFinancialSection(financial_section)
 temp_obj.setFunction(function)
 temp_obj.setGroup(group)
 temp_obj.setQuantity(quantity)
 #raise 'mayoro', ((temp_obj.getFunction(),temp_obj.getGroup(),temp_obj.getFinancialSection())) 
 #raise 'yooo', temp_obj.Base_viewDict()
 enough_budget = 0
 for objects in context.getPortalObject().budget_module.objectValues():
 if objects.getPortalType() == 'Mapped Value': 
 #raise 'yoooo', objects.Base_viewDict()
 res = objects.test(temp_obj)
 if res: 
 enough_budget = 1 
 if enough_budget == 0:
 error_message = 'Budget insuffisant ou budget ind\xc3\xa9finit pour la ou les comptes sources de la transaction'
 raise ValidationFailed, 'Impossible Action: '+error_message
 
 
 
 
 
 # delete empty transaction lines.
 DISABLED = 1
 if not DISABLED and not transaction.isSimulated() \
 and transaction.getSimulationState() in ("stopped", ) : 
 transaction.AccountingTransaction_deleteEmptyLines(redirect=0)
